For now, that's where I stand.

review: Love,Love, Love Amazon FireTV and Fire Sticks.  Dropped Cable TV and installed Fire Sticks on 2 TV's and a Fire TV system on one.  So great!!! We were trying to save money and got so tired of cable costs, installed a HD-TV antenna - outside - with fingers crossed, and have been more than happy with our decision.  I don't know about anyone else out there that are tired of the high cost of TV viewing, but believe me, we went this route and have been very pleased with the decision to save money; the beautiful picture (most channels look like Blu-Ray, and we have a Blu Ray player so I know how it should look), the terrific selection through Amazon Prime (I'm just a customer, for real) and the ability to watch different shows/movies on each TV.  Such a great service for such a small amount of money...if you're really interested in saving money, try it.  You will be so glad you did.
author: Glenna J. Judd "GJJ"
